title: Townhall
description: TaskForce, the institute's Social Initiatives Hub, organizes NIT Trichy's annual Townhall, an open forum for candid discussions between students and campus organizations.  Students gain a clear picture of how their semester donations are used during the event's live, unfiltered budget presentation, where each club reveals its plans, projects, and expenses.

title: Pre-Induction
description: TaskForce administers the Pre-Induction Task prior to the start of the official induction procedure for Deputy Managers.  Through this program, our second-year members actively support new NIT Trichy students by assisting them with the hostel assignment process and facilitating a smooth transition.  In addition to helping newcomers, this practical experience develops our members' leadership and sense of accountability.

title: RECycle
description: On campus, RECycle revitalizes abandoned bicycles, transforming them from neglected sheds to brand-new rides.  Every year, our staff picks up the bicycles that graduating students leave in the hostel sheds, refurbishes them in collaboration with reliable suppliers, and gets them safe and road-ready.  During orientation, these updated cycles are then offered to new students at reasonable costs, guaranteeing them a dependable and environmentally responsible means of transportation on campus right away.
